subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: ATLANTA, Aug. 5 (AP) — The rookie Yunel Escobar hit a run-scoring single in the 10th inning Sunday, giving the Atlanta Braves a 6-5 victory against the Colorado Rockies.
snippet: ATLANTA, Aug. 5 (AP) — The rookie Yunel Escobar hit a run-scoring single in the 10th inning Sunday, giving the Atlanta Braves a 6-5 victory against the Colorado Rockies.
